td.content: s:patient presents with moderate fatigue, mild abdominal pain, Cancer. she has history of moderate yellowing of the eye. she is a 32 yo female laundry worker. denies any alcohol use Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 68 in, Weight 105 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Pancreatic Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed gemcitabine - 1000 mg/m2 IV, and ordered CT Abdomen.

td.content: s:32 yo white female laundry worker presents with mild postural dizziness. pt also reports mild unsteadiness, mild nausea. denies any smoking she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 69 in, Weight 106 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18 a:Dizziness p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed meclizine - 25 mg daily, and ordered CBC.

td.content: s:pt with moderate fatigue, moderate yellowing of the eye and mild abdominal pain. she has had several such episodes over past 7 months. she is a 32 yr old female. o:Height 69 in, Weight 105 lbs, Temperature 99.2 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 15 a:Pancreatic Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed gemcitabine - 1000 mg/m2 IV, and ordered CT Abdomen.

s:patient presents w/ c/o 3 days h/o moderate ringing sensation in ear, moderate rotational vertigo and moderate dizziness. pt is a 32 yr old white F. o:Height 68 in, Weight 105 lbs, Temperature 99.2 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 15 a:Dizziness p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.
